data.text: @CBCNB Leave it to NB to wait until other jurisdictions lift mandates or these Drs just leave if they haven’t already.  I know of 2 fully vaccinated specialist who have recently left NB due to working conditions and it sounds like government is in no hurry to help.
@TheTruthNothin3 @CBCNB What part f the vaccine doesn’t stop infection or transmission don’t you understand?

@CBCNB These “physicians” are neither adhering to their training, which is based on known scientific principles, nor are they respecting their oath to “do no harm” by placing patients and colleagues at increased risk. The other 1800+ docs should be respected. Not these fools. Fire them.
@CBCNB I’m on a ten year wait list to get a family doctor in nb. 🤡🌎
@CBCNB Reinstate them immediately, my god, this shouldn’t be difficult
